<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change the filed "table" and "View" in table "sysrule_view_workspace" from unmandatory to mandatory.</description>
        <name>Add Table and View Mandatory</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[addMandatoryForTableAndView();
function addMandatoryForTableAndView() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	gr.addQuery("name", "sysrule_view_workspace");
	gr.addQuery("element=table^ORelement=view");
	gr.query();
	while (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue("mandatory", true);
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
